chat.confirmDeleteDescription: Once deleted, the chat cannot be recovered.
chat.noModelBanner: No models available, please select a model first
chat.onLimit: You have reached the {{plan}} plan usage limit, oap models cannot be used
chat.editDescription: Editing this message will generate a new response
chat.dragFiles: Drop files here to add to chat
chat.rateLimitExceededDescription: Please wait before making new requests; the quota will be restored automatically.

reAuthorize.title: Error occurred when trying to call the tool
reAuthorize.description: The authorization for this tool has expired or been canceled, so the tool cannot be used. A new authorization is required to restore full functionality.
reAuthorize.stopChange: Authorization in progress, do not modify the configuration

tokens.compositionAlt: This token count is estimated by Langchain, and the actual usage may vary slightly
tokens.firstDelayDesc: First delay: Time for AI to start generating the first character
tokens.generationRateDesc: Generation rate: Number of tokens AI can generate per second

setup.title: Initial Setup
setup.subtitle: Please configure model settings
setup.verifySuccessNoTool: Model verification successful, but does not support Tool Calls
setup.topPDescription: Top-P parameter controls the range of word selection. A value of 0 uses the default value; lower values select only high-probability words, resulting in conservative responses; higher values broaden the vocabulary range, leading to more varied responses.
setup.temperatureDescription: Temperature parameter controls response randomness. A value of 0 uses the default value; lower values produce more precise and stable responses; higher values generate more creative but less rigorous responses.

tools.title: Tools Management(MCP)
tools.reloadFailed: {{toolName}} has occurred an error, failed to reload
tools.reloadAllFailed: {{number}} tool calls have occurred an error, failed to reload

failTooltip.commandNotFound: We detected that the {{command}} command is missing from your "{{name}}" system, which is required to run this tool.
failTooltip.startFailed: An error occurred while running the MCP tool

tools.fieldTitleAlt: Fields usually satisfy most needs, but if your MCP settings require additional fields or different types, you can directly edit in the JSON TextArea on the right to meet your program requirements
tools.initialTimeoutAlt: The initial connection waiting time is set to 10 seconds by default, but can be set to any floating-point number of 10 seconds or more. There is no limit on the number of seconds. It is recommended to adjust this value if the server has a slow connection.
tools.initialTimeoutError: Please enter a number greater than or equal to 10
tools.jsonDesc: Please enter or paste MCP Server Json in the field
tools.toolCallTimeoutAlt: Default is 600 seconds, no maximum limit.
tools.toolCallTimeoutError: Please enter any float number greater than or equal to 0

jsonFormatError.addFormat: Configuration format error, please check and correct the format
jsonFormatError.format: {{mcp}} configuration format error, please check and correct the format
jsonFormatError.nameEmpty: Name cannot be empty, please enter a valid name
jsonFormatError.nameExist: A config with the name "{{mcp}}" already exists
jsonFormatError.stringError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be a string
jsonFormatError.numberError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be a number
jsonFormatError.floatError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be a float
jsonFormatError.booleanError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be set to true or false
jsonFormatError.arrayError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be provided as an array
jsonFormatError.objectError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be provided as an object
jsonFormatError.jsonError: Tool {{mcp}}: JSON format error, please check and correct the format
jsonFormatError.toolNumberError: Only one tool can be set in edit mode, please remove other non-tool items
jsonFormatError.urlError: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be a valid URL
jsonFormatError.enabled: Tool {{mcp}}: Field enabled must be set to true or false
jsonFormatError.command: Tool {{mcp}}: Field command must be a string
jsonFormatError.args: Tool {{mcp}}: Field args must be provided as an array
jsonFormatError.env: Tool {{mcp}}: Field env must be provided as an object
jsonFormatError.url: Tool {{mcp}}: Field url must be a string
jsonFormatError.transport: Tool {{mcp}}: Field transport can only be {{options}}
jsonFormatError.initialTimeout: Tool {{mcp}}: Field initialTimeout must be a float
jsonFormatError.range: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} value is out of range, please check and correct the value
jsonFormatError.minRange: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be greater than or equal to {{value}}
jsonFormatError.maxRange: Tool {{mcp}}: Field {{field}} must be less than or equal to {{value}}
jsonFormatError.commandOrUrlRequired: Tool {{mcp}}: Either command or url is required
jsonFormatError.urlRequiredstreamable: Tool {{mcp}}: url is required for streamable transport
jsonFormatError.urlRequiredsse: Tool {{mcp}}: url is required for SSE transport

no_oap_tool_message.custom: Please add a custom MCP Server.

tools.tag_oauth: Authorize access by connecting through OAuth

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.desc: You have unsaved changes. If you leave this page, the changes will be lost. Do you want to continue?
unsaved.errorDesc: The format of the changes is incorrect, please check and correct the format

tools.oauthAlert: Please confirm that you trust this connector: this connector has not been verified by Dive. You are responsible for all operations you perform with Dive.

oap.no_search_data: No search results found, please clear the search keyword or adjust the filter conditions.
oap.hint: High-level MCP Servers require upgrading to the Pro version to install
oap.high_cost_desc: You have selected MCP Servers that consume many tokens. Please check if your plan usage is sufficient.

connector.description: Dive will use OAuth connection authorization to securely connect your account with tools and start using pre-built connectors.
connector.confirmDisConnectDescription: You can still continue conversations that reference {{connector}} content, but Dive will not be able to access new content or perform new tasks.
connector.disconnectFailed: Failed to disconnect {{connector}}, please try again later
connector.listTooltip: Authorize access by connecting through OAuth

modelConfig.title: Model Settings
modelConfig.customInstructionsDescription: These prompts will be added to the end of each request's system prompt
modelConfig.modelDescriptionHint: Model name to use (Please enter API Key first to see available models)

models.title: Model Settings
models.deleteAllDescription: After deletion, no models will be available for conversation
models.verifyingAbort: Verification interrupted, please try again later
models.apiKeyError: Invalid API Key, please check and re-enter your API Key.
models.closeAllDescription: After deactivation, no models will be available for conversation
models.noModelAlertDescription: All selected models are not supported, conversation is not possible
models.verifyIgnoreAlt: Verification reminder will no longer be shown
models.verifyNextTimeAlt: Will ask for verification next time
models.verifyDesc: The following models are not verified. Would you like to verify them?
models.progressVerifying: Model verification in progress, please wait...

Error.empty: Custom model ID cannot be empty

models.streamingModeTooltip: Streaming Mode is when the model responds, it shows the content gradually, instead of showing it all at once. Turning off the button, in the Non-Streaming Mode, will wait for the model to generate the content completely and display it all at once, avoiding compatibility issues with tool calls in the model.
models.streamingModeDescription: Control how model responses are displayed
models.streamingModeAlert: Reminder: Some models only support tool calling in either Streaming Mode or Non-Streaming Mode. It's recommended to fully understand your needs before adjusting this parameter.
models.parameterValueDescription: Please select the parameter type first and then enter the value
models.parameterTypeStringDescription: Please enter a string, like medium
models.reasoningLevelDescription: Set the depth of model thinking
models.reasoningLevelTooltip: Low represents a quick response, focusing on conclusions and without additional details, with a direct and simple reasoning. Medium provides a response with sufficient logical explanation, covering key information. High offers a deep response with a structured and detailed analysis and explanation.
models.expiredInfo: This model is no longer on the official list and is only displayed as local history. It may not function or update properly. If you uncheck it, it will be removed and cannot be recovered from the list.
models.verifyErrorMsg: The model did not use any tools during verification, which may be due to its lack of support or not being triggered. Therefore, it is not possible to confirm whether it supports tools.
models.verifyStatusSuccess: Model verification successful, enabled with the original configuration
models.verifyStatusSuccessInPrompt: Model verification successful, enabled with MCP Prompts
models.verifyUnexpectedFailed: Model verification failed, an unknown error occurred, please try again later

providerFilter.Alt: If the model you want to use is not in the popular model options, you can use the search function to find it.

system.title: System Settings
system.languageDescription: Language used to display the system interface. The language used in the model can be modified in the model settings page, this refers to the language displayed on the Dive interface
system.themeDescription: Switch between system default and dark mode
system.autoDownloadDescription: Automatically download the new version of DIVE when the user restarts or clicks the "Upgrade" button on the menu page, the new version will be enabled
system.autoLaunchDescription: Automatically start Dive AI when the system starts
system.minimalToTrayDescription: When closing the window, the program will minimize to the system tray instead of exiting completely
system.loginDescription: Use OpenAgentPlatform to login, no technical background is required to easily connect LLMs, AI Agents and MCP Servers â€” Experience smart solutions now!
system.defaultSystemPromptDescription: Dive Default System Prompt is used as the default system prompt for chat. It tells the LLM that Dive chat supports KaTeX / Markdown / Mermaid, etc. This feature consumes certain tokens, which may make the response slower than the prompt without a system prompt. On the other hand, if it is disabled, the quality of the LLM's response may decrease
system.usageAnalytics: Go to the Dashboard page in OAP Hub to view
system.userEdit: Go to the Account page in OAP Hub to make changes
system.usageWarning: Quota resets next month, or purchase credit package for more usage. Limited provision of the Base MCP servers.
system.BaseUsageWarning: Base MCP servers: {{mcpLimit}} calls per hour. To use other MCP servers, please upgrade your plan from the <planLink>Billing page</planLink>.
system.customPromptDescription: If you need additional custom instructions, please click the "Custom Prompt" function below to set it up.
system.tokenPackageHint: Credit packages have no expiration date and will only be used after the monthly plan quota is exhausted.
system.tokenPackageWarning: You can replenish more credits at the OAPhub <planLink>Dashboard page</planLink>.
system.skipTlsVerifyWarning: Security warning: Ignoring certificate verification may reduce connection security. It is recommended to use in trusted network environments.
system.rateLimitReachedDescription: Please wait before making new requests; the quota will be restored automatically.

login.subtitle: Dive AI is an open-source desktop application that seamlessly integrates various large language models supporting function calls. Through its clean and intuitive interface, you can easily converse with cutting-edge AI, from daily Q&A to professional tasks, getting precise responses and making it your intelligent assistant.
login.description1: Suitable for advanced AI experts. If you already have your own configuration ready, whether it's local Ollama, llama.cpp, or remote Openrouter, OpenAI, Anthropic, or other AI companies' LLM APIs, please use this option.
login.description2: OAP makes it easy for everyone to use the most advanced AI services, connecting LLMs, AI Agents, and MCP Servers without requiring technical expertise. Explore the unlimited possibilities of AI and experience intelligent solutions now.

InstallHostDependencies.title: Downloading Host Dependencies...
InstallHostDependencies.tip: If an error occurs during download, please close this window first and restart the application to re-download.

deeplink.mcpInstallConfirm: Add stdio MCP Service - You will add MCP via the following command, please confirm:
